jobs.title: Research Fellow of the F.R.S.-FNRS (PhD Thesis)
jobs.organization: F.R.S.-FNRS, University of Mons, University of Antwerp, Belgium
jobs.description:
Title: Improvement of the state of the art regarding the theory of learning algorithms for automata models extended with resources and its applications to black-box model-checking.

Supervisors: [Véronique Bruyère](https://web.umons.ac.be/fs-informatique/equipes/veronique-bruyere/) (University of Mons) and [Guillermo A. Perez](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/staff/guillermoalberto-perez/) (University of Antwerp).

jobs.title: Research Stay
jobs.description: Research stay to collaborate with Frits W. Vaandrager.

jobs.title: Master's Thesis
jobs.description:
Title: Efficient Learning of Automata and Automata with One Counter.

Supervisor: [Véronique Bruyère](https://web.umons.ac.be/fs-informatique/equipes/veronique-bruyere/).

jobs.title: Internship
jobs.description:
Implementation of an active learning algorithm for visibly one-counter automata.

Supervisor: [Guillermo A. Perez](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/staff/guillermoalberto-perez/).

jobs.title: Research initiation internship
jobs.description:
Subject: Efficient algorithms for Nash equilibrium computation.

Supervisors: [Aline Goeminne](https://alinegoeminne.github.io/), [Thomas Brihaye](https://staff.umons.ac.be/thomas.brihaye/), [Véronique Bruyère](https://web.umons.ac.be/fs-informatique/equipes/veronique-bruyere/), and [Hadrien Mélot](https://web.umons.ac.be/algo/en/hadrien-melot/).
